home.intro2: I make fast, accessible websites and games. I specialize in React, modern JavaScript, Unity and Godot. Currently a Computer Science student at Can Tho University.

navigation.translationwarning: Only UI elements are translated, not blog posts though.

caas.desc1: A chatbot application where you can ask for admission details from a college institution.
caas.desc2: There would be a backend for training models and a database of FAQ from the institution. But it isn't deployed yet, for now, it forwarded all questions to an LLM.
caas.desc3: Front-end → CAAS system (return related information) → forward it to Gemini

terraship.desc1: A hardcore space shooter game with some rogue-like twists, destroy rocks and enemies coming toward you to earn points, with a campaign-based gameplay. Each level is procedurally generated with increasing difficulty.
terraship.desc2: There's an online leaderboard, multi-platform support (Web/Android/Windows), and localization support, too.
terraship.desc3: Probably my most feature completed game so far. Making games is so exhausting!
